✱ Masks and protection should be used when working in dusty environments. The factory employers should provide the necessary protective gear to 
workers.      
✱ It is important to see a health professional for regular health check-ups.
✱ One should go to the doctor if one gets early morning cough. It is important 
not to waste time. 
Cancer
Cancer is a group of diseases with abnormal growth of cells in any part of the 
body.  These cells spread to nearby areas or to distant parts of the body. Both men 
and women can have cancer, but some cancers are more common among men and some, more common among women. 
Some risk factors of cancer:    
✱  Tobacco in any form (chewing and smoking).
✱ Harmful use of alcohol.
✱ Unhealthy diet
✱ The risk of developing most cancers increases with age
